TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Extension extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData

summary.span: 代表 X509 擴充功能。

span.span: Represents an X509 extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks X509 擴充功能是動態的擴充屬性，可以加入 X509 憑證並進行變更。X509 extensions are dynamic, extended properties that can be added to an X509 certificate and changed. 類別可以用來建立與憑證相關聯，但不屬於憑證的憑證授權單位 (CA) 發行的擴充功能。The class can be used to create extensions that are associated with a certificate but are not part of a certificate as issued by a certification authority (CA). 在最基本的形式，X509 擴充功能有物件識別碼 (OID) 的布林值，描述是否延伸模組視為重大和 ASN 編碼的資料。In its most basic form, an X509 extension has an object identifier (OID), a Boolean value describing whether the extension is considered critical or not, and ASN-encoded data. 可以在註冊自訂的擴充功能檔案。Custom extensions can be registered in a file. .Net Framework 包含多個實作數個常見的 X509 擴充功能：The.NET Framework includes implementations of several common X509 extensions: - 。. 描述憑證的金鑰使用方式。Describes the key usages of a certificate. - 。. 描述憑證的條件約束。Describes the constraints for a certificate. - 。. 描述憑證的增強金鑰使用方式。Describes the enhanced key usages of a certificate. - 。. 描述的索引鍵的識別碼。Describes the key identifier. 例如，XMLDSIG 搭配使用。For example, used with XMLDSIG. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立空物件，不同於其他建構函式為此類別用來建立物件的位元組陣列、 指標或憑證檔案的憑證資訊。This constructor creates an empty object, unlike the other constructors for this class that use certificate information from either a byte array, a pointer or a certificate file to create the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]
